All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
BackgroundMusicManager
Manages the background music for the game.
Coin
Represents a coin collectible in the game.
CoinsCollected
Represents a HUD element that displays the number of coins collected by the player.
Door
Represents a door in the game world.
Elevator
Represents an elevator platform that moves vertically between two points.
Enemy
Represents a generic enemy in the game.
FallingSpike
A spike that remains stationary until the player moves underneath, then drops straight down and deals 2 points of damage on collision.
Fly
Represents a fly enemy in the game.
Game
The main class for the game "Tamaros's Adventure: The Invincible Jump".
GameView
Represents the view for the game world.
GameWorld
Represents the game world where all game objects and interactions take place.
Ground
Represents a ground platform in the game.
HealthBar
Represents a health bar HUD element that displays the player's health.
HealthCollectible
Represents a health collectible in the game.
MoveFallingSpike
A spike that falls when the player is detected and inflicts damage on contact.
PauseControl
Handles the pause functionality in the game.
Player
Represents the player character in the game.
PlayerController
Handles player input for controlling the character's movement and actions.
Snail
Represents a Snail enemy in the game.
Timer
Represents a timer used to track elapsed time in the game.
Trampoline
A trampoline platform that launches the player upward when they collide with it.
